data.remarks: There is change in the Trustees of The Sri Krishna Trust from Piramal Management Services Private Limited to Mr. Ajay G. Piramal and Dr. (Mrs.) Swati A. Piramal. The Sri Krishna Trust continues to hold 8,39,05,941 equity shares of the Company through its new trustees. As such, there is no change in ownership of shares.
